code: export var changeLimit=function changeLimit(){return{type:'INCREASE_LIMIT'};};export var setName=function setName(name){return{type:'SET_NAME',name:name};};export var setSort=function setSort(prop,val){return{type:'SET_SORT',prop:prop,val:val};};export var toggleOptions=function toggleOptions(){return{type:'TOGGLE_OPTIONS'};};export var toggleStyles=function toggleStyles(){return{type:'TOGGLE_STYLES'};};export var setStyles=function setStyles(style){return{type:'SET_STYLE',style:style};};export var clearOptions=function clearOptions(){return{type:'CLEAR_OPTIONS'};};export var setCards=function setCards(cards){return{type:'SET_CARDS',cards:cards};};export var setFormats=function setFormats(fmts){return{type:'SET_FORMATS',fmts:fmts};};export var setSets=function setSets(sts){return{type:'SET_SETS',sts:sts};};
